comment: Time in seconds until a chat message scrolls out of view.
activation of screensaver/powersave mode (1 = prevent, 0 = do not prevent)
If set, "PrtScr" key will make pretty screenshots (no overlays) instead of normal ones (1 = pretty, 0 = normal).
Sets the compression level for JPEG screenshots, 0-100 (default 90).
Sets the duration in ms for the action camera before switching views. (default is 8000, i.e. 8 seconds).
Determines the thickness of the padlock box.
Number in seconds for how long the box should be displayed over any one padlock subject before it disappears (-1 turns it off).
Specifies whether the OnlinePlayersDisplay overlay should be ON(1) or OFF(0) by default when entering 3D.
Specifies whether the frame rate overlay should be ON(1) or OFF(0) by default when entering 3D.
Enables the RWR MFD page back for the F16s (unrealistic feature).
Enables the HUD AOA for non-F16 aircraft.
Enables the user to control WinAmp.
This determines the minimum bump intensity "peak time", i.e how long a value is visible in shared memory (default 100).
Enables playback of the various sound comments in the dogfight scores menu.
Overrides all A/C "viewlimit pitch down" values from the 3dckpit.dat files, max. 90.0, only higher values take effect.
The MTBF in hours. If set to 0, uses the value in ac.dat.
F-18C Work In Progress Avionics (disabled by default).
